**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IDragStrategy 
```

</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[drag(newLoc, e)](./blockly.idragstrategy_interface.drag_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Handles moving elements to the new location, and updating any visuals based on that (e.g connection previews for blocks).


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[endDrag(e)](./blockly.idragstrategy_interface.enddrag_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Handles any drag cleanup, including e.g. connecting or deleting blocks.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[isMovable()](./blockly.idragstrategy_interface.ismovable_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Returns true iff the element is currently movable.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[revertDrag()](./blockly.idragstrategy_interface.revertdrag_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Moves the draggable back to where it was at the start of the drag.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[startDrag(e)](./blockly.idragstrategy_interface.startdrag_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Handles any drag startup (e.g moving elements to the front of the workspace).


</td></tr>
